name: Sangrita
description: More of an accompaniment than a chaser, this traditional blend of tomato, orange, and lime juices is Zane Lamprey's favorite tequila partner.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice, reserving squeezed limes to rim glasses
1/2 teaspoon pico de gallo (Mexican fruit salad spice), plus more for rimming glasses

recipeInstructions.text: Mix orange juice, tomato juice, lime juice, hot sauce, and pico de gallo in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well.
Rub rim of serving glasses with lime. Sprinkle a few teaspoons of pico de gallo on a saucer and dip each glass in to coat the rim. Strain sangrita into rimmed glasses. Serve with shots of tequila.
